scenes.background: You decided to join the discussion via video call, while [Monica] and [Bob] are in the office.
scenes.description: 'We can't seem to make progress without your input. How should we proceed?'

options.text: Can you please try to follow the guidelines I left once more?
options.analysis: You showed good self-regulation by maintaining your boundaries, but your empathy and motivation to help were lower.

options.text: I think you both can handle it without me. Letâ€™s touch base later.
options.analysis: You maintained strong self-regulation and social skills, but your perception, empathy, and motivation were lower.

options.text: I can help for a bit, but I need to get back to my leave soon.
options.analysis: You balanced your willingness to help with your need for time off, showing good perception and motivation, though your self-regulation was slightly lower.
